panels.title: Incoming Requests by Source And Response Code

targets.expr: sum(irate(istio_requests_total:sysdig{reporter="destination", connection_security_policy="mutual_tls", response_code!~"5.*"}[5m])) by (source_workload, source_workload_namespace) / sum(irate(istio_requests_total:sysdig{reporter="destination", connection_security_policy="mutual_tls"}[5m])) by (source_workload, source_workload_namespace)

sum(irate(istio_requests_total:sysdig{reporter="destination", connection_security_policy!="mutual_tls", response_code!~"5.*"}[5m])) by (source_workload, source_workload_namespace) / sum(irate(istio_requests_total:sysdig{reporter="destination", connection_security_policy!="mutual_tls"}[5m])) by (source_workload, source_workload_namespace)
